TopicTitle: My transfer stage got stuck in Minmus. New .24 feature?

Articles.Content:
http://imgur.com/a/pMXna

Anyone else encountered this? I followed it down and was very surprised when it lodged itself in the hillside.
That is awesome. I want to say I've seen that a couple of months ago, but it may have been someone whose whole rocket ended up lodged in a hillside on Minmus.
0.24 introduced a lot of new bugs, which is typical of a major update for any game. It's especially bad for people who use 64-bit, because there's some different code which is extremely glitchy.
It happens sometimes, I had it with bobcats soyuz in .21. Definitely not new.
